scripts.build: bun run --cwd ../../libs/components build && storybook build -c .storybook -o storybook-static
scripts.verify: bun run --cwd ../../libs/components build && storybook build -c .storybook -o storybook-static && node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(!fs.existsSync('storybook-static/index.html')){process.exit(1)}"
